extension.name: Content - MijoShop
extension.author: Mijosoft LLC
extension.description: Display any product anywhere by using this syntax (only id=5 is compulsory): {mijoshop id=5,image=1:80:80,name=1,price=1,rating=1,button=1,options=option_oc[226]:15}

field.name: show_image
field.label: Show Product Image
field.description: Select if you want to show the image of the product.

field.name: image_width
field.label: Product Image Width
field.description: Enter the width of the image.

field.name: image_height
field.label: Product Image Height
field.description: Enter the height of the image.

field.name: show_name
field.label: Show Product Name
field.description: Select if you want to show the name of the product.

field.name: show_price
field.label: Show Product Price
field.description: Select if you want to show the price of the product.

field.name: show_rating
field.label: Show Product Rating
field.description: Select if you want to show the rating of the product.

field.name: show_button
field.label: Show Add to Cart
field.description: Select if you want to show the Add to Cart button.

field.name: show_box
field.label: Show Box
field.description: Select if you want to show a box that wraps the product.

field.name: show_heading
field.label: Show Box Header
field.description: Select if you want to show the header of the above box.
